column4: so im trying to upgrade opera to 9.52 from 9.51 from a .deb file, but when i click install package, it tells me another synaptics program is open, but it isnt!
do you have update-manager running? or apt-get or aptitude or adept?
That might be update-manager doing its thing.  If you do this: `sudo apt-get update` what error do you get?
alright, that's not a "another instance is running" error.
